Contents:
" FIRST EDITION, PENNED BY FATHER AMBROSE OF GRENZELHOFT "


PSYBIBLE.


PSY 1:1 In the beginning, existence was nothing more than a chaotic vortex. This changed, however, when - whether through mere happenstance or unseen intervention - 'something' emerged. Sloughing off the cosmic afterbirth, the 'thing' took his first breaths under a starless sky, illuminated only by the quasaric womb beneath him.
